RM1400-RM2000++ General : Store Crew, Account Clerk, Cashier by Hyuen Group Sdn Bhd Categorized Under ( General ) Sponsor Ads
We are hiring now, for a new brand, it\’s fast food restaurant. Hiring a few positions:
1) Office Admin, Clerk, Account ( know accouting software) RM1600++ 2) Store Crew–Around RM1500++ 3) Processing Crew–Around RM1400++ 4) Central Kitchen Supervisor–Around RM1900++ 5)Store Manager Around RM2000++
We prefer local Malaysian.
All depends on experience. Interested please email to general@hyuengroup.com or call Mr Tan, 0175245338, Ms Ooi, 0124060929 to arrange an interview.
Mobile 0124060929 Salary RM1400-RM2000++ Location Selangor Working Hours Depends Onsite No Needed Skills UBS, Bookeeping, Cashier, Store Crew Start Date Immediately Duration Full Time
